com.android.view

类 CircleProgressView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.android.view.CircleProgressView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class CircleProgressView
extends android.view.View
    Created by Relin on 2018-08-10. 圈圈进度控件 圆圈进度控件支持进度显示，修改进度背景色 和进度颜色、圆圈边框宽度、圆圈半径大小 The circle progress control supports
    progress display,modifying progress
    background color and progress color,
    circle border width, and circle radius size
